indexes.reason: Frequently filtered by user and time range
indexes.sql: CREATE INDEX idx_audit_logs_user_time ON audit_logs(user_id, created_at);

indexes.reason: Common query pattern for user activity reports
indexes.sql: CREATE INDEX idx_user_activity_user_time ON user_activity_logs(user_id, timestamp);

indexes.reason: Task management queries often filter by status and due date
indexes.sql: CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_status_due ON tasks(status, due_date);

indexes.reason: Financial reports often group by category and time
indexes.sql: CREATE INDEX idx_expenses_category_time ON expenses(category_id, created_at);

indexes.reason: Email is used for authentication and should be unique
indexes.sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_users_email ON users(email);

indexes.reason: Active organization queries with temporal filtering
indexes.sql: CREATE INDEX idx_organizations_active_time ON organizations(is_active, created_at);
